about_the_game:
One moment you were walking home, the next - a wrong step, a sudden fall, and you found yourself in an endless expanse of pools stretching into infinity. Welcome to Level 7 of the Backrooms, known as "The Poolrooms". With nothing but a fishing rod and your wits, you must fish to survive in this liminal space where reality itself seems to ripple like water.

The pools here are home to strange creatures, some docile, others dangerous, but all holding clues to your escape. As you cast your line into these mysterious waters, you'll discover that each catch not only sustains you but also unveils the secrets of this impossible place.

• EXPLORE & FISH - Cast your line into the otherworldly waters of the Backrooms, where each pool holds unknown creatures waiting to be discovered.

• UPGRADE & PROGRESS - Enhance your fishing capabilities with a comprehensive upgrade system. Improve your rod, bait, and fishing techniques to catch increasingly elusive creatures.

• RESEARCH & COLLECT - Document your catches in a detailed collection system. Study each specimen to unlock new knowledge about the Backrooms' ecosystem.

• ACHIEVE & MASTER - Complete challenging achievements as you become more proficient at navigating and fishing in this strange dimension.

• UNCOVER THE SECRETS - Fill your journal with observations and discoveries. Each new creature and successful catch reveals another fragment of the Backrooms' mysterious story, slowly piecing together the truth of this strange realm.

The deeper you fish, the more you'll discover about this mysterious place. Will you uncover all the secrets lurking beneath the surface of the Backrooms' endless pools?

Every successful catch brings new discoveries, and every discovery leads to more questions about this impossible place. Your journal tells your story, while your collection grows with  undiscovered specimens.

Are you ready to cast your line into the unknown?

legal_notice: Inspired by the concept of the Backrooms, this is a standalone game that, while drawing inspiration from the wider Backrooms phenomenon, has no connection to Kane Pixels' work or the Backrooms Wiki and Fandom.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any modern Linux distribution / SteamOS
  • Processor: x86_64 processor (64-bit), 1.6 GHz dual-core or better
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any built-in graphics card
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Built-in audio

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.13 (High Sierra) or later
  • Processor: 64-bit Intel or Apple Silicon (M1 or later)
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any built-in graphics card
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Built-in audio device

name: Backrooms Fishing

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz dual-core processor or bette
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any built-in graphics card
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Built-in audio

short_description: Idle and catch mysterious creatures lurking in the Poolrooms. Upgrade your fishing equipment, research bizarre specimens, and build your collection as you uncover the secrets of the Backrooms. Every catch will bring you closer to understanding this strange realm.
